response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which is valued at $1,200,000 to both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique benefits, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $1,100,000. This is an opportunity not only to acquire a valuable asset but also to secure a significant saving. I trust this proposal will meet your expectations and aligns with your financial planning. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 1100000}
